item.title: First post
item.description: Introduction I’m a pretty boring guy, so I thought I’d make a post about myself just to get that out of the way. Development career To start off, I do all of the development work for the Twitch VTuber KazukiVT.1 Right now they are running a proprietary panel for their stream. It will be open-sourced eventually, but I’m not sure when. I also do some web development on the side, though that’s pretty rare.
